resources.string: Yamaha is the king of the local automatic scooter segment, with its most popular offerings which have been coming from the Mio series. The Mio Soul i 125 Standard is the another scooter among the models coming from the Mio lineup. This stylish scooter is basically targeted for the adult bike lovers in Philippine with three different colors. Let\'s take a look at some of the pros and cons of this Mio Soul i 125 scooter.
